fields.template: Thanks for purchasing Bajaj Bike. Your Customer ID is {customer_id}. Please furnish the same for every free service.
fields.description: Send registration confirmation message to customer

fields.template: VIN: {vin} Coupon: {usc} Valid days: {valid_days} Valid kms: {valid_kms}. Please provide the UCN# to the service advisor at the time of vehicle delivery only.
fields.description: Send customer service detail with product and valid coupon id

fields.template: No service register for Customer ID: {sap_customer_id}
fields.description: Send on if customer ID is not valid

fields.template: Please proceed for free service {service_type} for Customer ID : {customer_id}, mobile : {customer_phone}
fields.description: Send on valid coupon id

fields.template: Cannot proceed for Free Service {service_type} for Customer ID {customer_id}, as DAYS/KMS has exceeded
fields.description: Send on invalid coupon id and it also contain next valid coupon id

fields.template: Invalid ID or No Free service coupon available for this product
Invalid service type: {service_type}
Congratulations for availing Free Service {service_type}. Your Unique Coupon Number is {coupon}. Please provide this number at the time of delivery only. Happy Riding
fields.description: Send coupon validation SMS to customer also

fields.template: Information provided by you is invalid for Free Service {service_type}
fields.description: Send coupon invalid SMS to customer also

fields.template: Unauthorized dealer:{0}
fields.description: Send message when dealer not authorized

fields.template: Reminder: Your Coupon {usc} for product {vin} will expire on {expired_date} having valid kms {valid_kms}
fields.description: Send reminder SMS on coupon expiry

fields.template: Service Completion for Customer ID {customer_id} and FSC {usc} tagged into the system. Thank You
fields.description: Send SMS on coupon completion

fields.template: Invalid message For any assistance please contact our customer care at ++91-7847011011
fields.description: Send SMS when received message is invalid

fields.template: CUSTOMER ID: {sap_customer_id} VIN: {vin}
fields.description: Send the brand data detail

fields.template: {email_id} {name}
fields.description: Receive message template from customer for registration

fields.template: {sap_customer_id}
fields.description: Receive this message template when customer request for his/her service

fields.template: {sap_customer_id} {kms} {service_type}
fields.description: Receive this message when SA send to check the coupon status

fields.template: {sap_customer_id} {usc}
fields.description: Receive this message from SA for coupon close

fields.template: {brand_id}
fields.description: Receive this message from Customer for all brand product detail

fields.template: Supported keyword: 1.A 2.C 3.SD 4.R
fields.description: Send supported message format to customer

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Congrats on your purchase of Bajaj bike. Your customer id is {sap_customer_id}. Refer this id during servicing.
fields.description: Send message to customer on purchase

fields.template: Incorrect Customer ID or UCN
fields.description: Send message to SA reg wrong Customer-Id or wrong UCN

fields.template: No Digitised FSC for the service type {1} available for Customer ID {0}
fields.description: Send when there is no UCN or all UCN are closed

fields.template: Your one time password is {0}
fields.description: Send OTP

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Congrats on your purchase of Bajaj bike. Your Temporary customer id is {sap_customer_id}. Refer this id during servicing till you get Permanent Customer ID
fields.description: Send temporary customer ID to Customer

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Your permanent customer ID is {sap_customer_id} for your Bajaj bike. Please refer this ID during servicing of your bike
fields.description: Send new sap ID to Customer

fields.template: Sorry, you are not authorised to initiate this activity
fields.description: Send message to unauthorised SA

fields.template: The FSC is already tagged in the system
fields.description: Send coupon is closed message to an initiator if it has been closed by some other SA

fields.template: Thanks for providing {type}. We will get back to you soon.
fields.description: Send this message when service advisor files complain successfully

fields.template: {message}
fields.description: Receive this message when service advisor files complain

fields.template: A GladDesk ticket GM-{id} has been assigned to you, which says: {message} Its has been reported by {reporter} on {created_date}. Please address the issue as soon as possible.
fields.description: You have been assigned this task.

fields.template: Your {type} has been assigned to one of our technician. Severity:{priority}.
fields.description: Your feedback has been assigned to one of our technician  is looking into it.

fields.template: Your {type} has been resolved.
fields.description: Your Complaint has been resolved.

fields.template: Free service {service_type} is already in-progress. Please proceed for the same for Customer ID {customer_id}
fields.description: Send in-progress coupon if it is available

fields.template: The request cannot be processed as the the current status of the requested service type {req_service_type} is {req_status}.
fields.description: Send in-progress coupon if it is available

fields.template: {params} {message}
fields.description: Receive this message for getting customer details

fields.template: Your {0} is {1}.
fields.description: Send ID or VIN to customer depending upon message he sent

fields.template: Incorrect {0} or no matching details.
fields.description: Send on if customer ID or VIN does not exists.

fields.template: {upc}
fields.description: Receive this message when mechanic send spare to accumulate points

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, {added_points} points updated. Total points: {total_points}.{invalid_upcs} To Redeem, Send SMS with Code RD<SPACE><MEMBER ID><SPACE><PRODUCT CODE> to 7757057457
fields.description: Send this message when mechanic send product to accumulate points

fields.template: Invalid Entry... UPC does not exist in our records. Please contact our Customer Care at: +91-7847011011
fields.description: Send this message when single UPC does not exists in our records

fields.template: {member_id} {product_id}
fields.description: Receive this message when mechanic send product to redeem points

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, Your  request is submitted to Bajaj for Approval. Req ID:{transaction_id}. We shall update you when your products are shipped. Balance Points : {total_points}
fields.description: Send this message when mechanic send product to redeem points

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, Sorry, you need {shortage_points} more points for these products. Please check catalog and submit new request.
fields.description: Send this message when user does not have enough points to redeem a multiple product

fields.template: You have not registered for the loyalty program. Please contact our Customer Care +91-7847011011
fields.description: Send this message when mechanic is unregistered

fields.template: The due date for the ticket which was assigned to {assign_to} has been exceeded and the issue is not yet resolved.
fields.description: Send this message to escalation group if due date exceeds

fields.template: Your {type} will be resolved by {due_date}.
fields.description: Due Date has been changed

fields.template: Maximum allowed part code is {max_limit}
fields.description: maximum allowed UPCs

fields.template: Welcome Mr {mechanic_name}, to Bajaj Commercial Vehicle Power reward program.The welcome kit will be dispatched soon. your id is {member_id}
fields.description: welcome message to mechanic

fields.template: Incomplete form status. Please contact our customer care +91-7847011011 to complete the form.
fields.description: Send this message when mechanic has incomplete form

fields.template: Mobile number {phone_number} already exists. Please contact Customer support at +91-7847011011
fields.description: Send this message when customer phone number cannot be updated

fields.template: Mobile number of customer-id : {customer_id} was changed from {old_number} to {new_number} by {dealer_asc_id}
fields.description: Send this message when customer phone number is updated

fields.template: {member}
fields.description: Receive this message when user wants to check his points balance

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, Total Points as of {today} is {total_points}. Please contact Customer Care +91-7847011011 for any queries.
fields.description: Send this message when user checks his balance points

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, your registered mobile number with Bajaj Auto has been changed to {new_number}. If you notice any discrepancy please contact +91-7847011011
fields.description: Send this message when customer phone number cannot be updated

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, Sorry, you need {shortage_points} more points for this product. You have {total_points} accumulated points.
fields.description: Send this message when user does not have enough points to redeem a single product

fields.template: Invalid Entry... Product ID does not exist in our records. Please contact our Customer Care at: +91-7847011011
fields.description: Send this message when redemption product-ID does not exists in our records

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, Invalid Membership ID. Please refer Membership card for your ID.
fields.description: Send this message when member-ID does not match our records

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, Ref Req ID - {transaction_id}. Your gift {product_name} has been {status}.
fields.description: Send this message when member-ID redemption request changes

fields.template: Dear {mechanic_name}, Welcome to the Bajaj USTAAD loyalty program. To ACCUMULATE POINTS, send SMS AC Unique_Code1 Unique_Code2 to 7757057457
fields.description: welcome message to mechanic

fields.template: The due date for the ticket with transaction ID:{transaction_id} and status:{status} has been exceeded and the issue is not yet resolved.
fields.description: Send this message to escalation group if due date exceeds

fields.template: Mobile number update not allowed. Please contact customer support: +91-7847011011.
fields.description: Send this message when customer phone number cannot be updated

fields.template: FSC cannot be closed with this option. Please use CDMS system to close FSC
fields.description: Send message when dealer not authorized to close coupon
Send message for change in customer support

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Congratulations for owning KTM Duke Bike. Download link for KTM Duke Owner's Manual for Android. Users: {duke_android_url} and Web Users : {duke_web_url}
fields.description: Send message on KTM DUKE bike purchase

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Congratulations for owning KTM RC Bike. Download link for KTM RC Owner's Manual for Android. Users: {rc_android_url} and Web Users : {rc_web_url}
fields.description: Send message on KTM RC bike purchase

fields.template: {registration_number} {customer_name} {phone_number} {purchase_date}
fields.description: Receive message template from owner for registration

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, Thanks for registering, and your customer id is {customer_id}. Please refer this ID during servicing.
fields.description: Send registration confirmation message to customer

fields.template: {registration_number} {phone_number}
fields.description: Receive message template from rider for registration

fields.template: Dear Rider, Thanks for updating your mobile number {phone_number}
fields.description: Send registration confirmation message to rider

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, The mobile number is updated for registration number {registration_number}. For any query contact customer support {phone_number}
fields.description: Send registration confirmation message to owner

fields.template: The customer details are successfully updated in the system
fields.description: Send success message to the rider

fields.template: Invalid Registration Number. Please check registration number and try again. If unsuccessful, please contact customer support {phone_number}
fields.description: Send when registration number doesnot exist

fields.template: The details are successfully registered in the system
fields.description: Send success message to the owner

fields.template: Invalid registration number or purchase date. Please check and try again. If unsuccessful, please contact customer support {phone_number}
fields.description: Send when registration number doesnot exist

fields.template: Sorry you are not authorised to initiate this activity
fields.description: Send message to unauthorised Dealer

fields.template: This mobile number cannot be registered and exceeds maximum limit. Please contact customer support: +91-7847011011.
fields.description: Send this message when vin cannot be registered

fields.template: Dear {customer_name}, your registered mobile number has been changed to {new_number}. If you notice any discrepancy please contact {phone_number}
fields.description: Send this message when owner phone number is updated
